name: chicagotribune
text:
Chicago police prepare for Election Day unrest, Pat O’Brien outpaces Kim Foxx in fundraising, and Pritzker’s state income tax bill would rise to $10.5 million under graduated tax plan.

Here are today’s top stories in Chicago politics, from @byldonovan: https://t.co/QBvEwlSJt0

name: chicagotribune
text:
RT @ChicagoSports: If you think Las Vegas oddsmakers hold the Bears in low esteem, you are correct.

And it might not end anytime soon, @BradBiggs writes.

https://t.co/uZWKxsJbCL

name: chicagotribune
text: RT @chitribopinions: We demand more than diversity. Many storied institutions have made their fortune through racist acts. Remedying that fact requires honest acknowledgment of the past, and well-resourced actions in the present, Adrienne R. Brown and Eve L. Ewing write. https://t.co/5fBf1U8loV
